item.description:
Las Vegas Weekend~~3 Nights March 1-4, 2012

  • Thursday, March 1, 2012, 12:00 PM

Flamingo Hotel and Casino

3555 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas, NV

  • Las Vegas Boulevard, Las LasVegas, NV (map)

ROUNDTRIP  on SOUTHWEST from BRADLEY Airport to LAS VEGAS and YOUR STAY AT THE FLAMINGO FROM THURSDAY, MARCH 1 through SUNDAY, MARCH 4. Price per person $576.13 INCLUDES AIRPORT TRANSFERS TO/FROM FLAMINGO.

Go to http://www.southwestvacations.com/

Book yours today!!!

Also use promotion code:       save250

Add-on transfer to/from airport.

 Southwest Airlines

 Flight: 1612
   Class: W Economy/Coach Class
   Number of Stops: 0

 

Depart: Thursday 1 March, 2012 Hartford at 2:30PM
Arrive: Thursday 1 March, 2012 Las Vegas at 5:35PM

_______________________________

Southwest Airlines
   Flight: 2024
   Class: W Economy/Coach Class
   Number of Stops: 0

Depart: Sunday 4 March, 2012 Las Vegas at 9:10AM
Arrive: Sunday 4 March, 2012 Hartford at 5:05PM

First and second checked bags fly FREE! (weight and size limits apply)

Hotel - check in 3/1/2012 and check out 3/4/2012 Flamingo Las Vegas

Deluxe Room

Swimming pools may be closed for winter months (Nov-Mar) due to maintenance or weather

 Round-trip Airport/Strip Hotel Transfers Date - March 01 2 Adults $14.00 ea. Close Close Round-trip Airport/Strip Hotel Transfers Date - March 01 2 Adults $14.00 ea. Close Close Round-trip Airport/Strip Hotel Transfers Date - March 01 2 Adults $14.00 ea. Close Close Round-trip Airport/Strip Hotel Transfers Date - March 01 2 Adults $14.00 ea.

 

 A mandatory hotel-imposed fee of $15 per room, per day will be charged and collected by the hotel for all U.S. Domestic, Canada, and Mexico origin reservations either at check-in or check-out. This fee is not included in your package price.
